00002 /* Facilities for logging */
00003 
00004 #ifndef __SLIME_LOGGING_H__
00005 #define __SLIME_LOGGING_H__
00006 #include <stdio.h>
00007 
00008 extern FILE* logg_file;
00009 
00010 void logging_init(void);
00011 
00012 #if SLIME_ENABLE_LOGGING
00013 #define logg(FMT, ...) \
00014   fprintf(logg_file, __FUNCTION__ ": " FMT "\n",##__VA_ARGS__)
00015 #else
00016 #define logg(...)
00017 #endif
00018 #endif
